caption.p: Histopathological evaluation of the brain of the control and stressed groups, the samples were stained with hematoxillin and eosin, the arrows represent pathological changes in tissue: ( a) control groups: normal tissue ×200; ( b) H 2O 2 group: congestion ×200; ( c) H 2O 2 group: hemorrhage ×200; ( d) H 2O 2 + Argan group: congestion ×400; ( e): H 2O 2 + Argan + Syzygium aromaticum essential oil group: the yellow arrow represent congestion and the black arrow represent inflammatory cells infiltration ×200.
